storm.dsp.util
类 DSPPropertyUtil

java.lang.Object
  storm.dsp.util.DSPPropertyUtil

public class DSPPropertyUtil
extends java.lang.Object

作者：
wangadong

字段摘要
static int ALARM_BOLT_NUMBER
          AlarmBolt number for DSP topology,basically 1
static boolean ALARM_TO_KAFKA
          If True, the alarm will sent to a Kafka Broker with topic "alarm"
static int DELAY_COUNT_NUM
          For test case, It's used to set the count frequency
static int DISPATCHER_BOLT_NUMBER
          DispatcherBolt number for DSP topology, usually 1
static java.lang.String KAFKA_BROKER_URL
          Kafka Server Address
static int KAFKA_FORCE_START_OFFSET_TIME
          It is a config of KafkaSpout, used to define where to start consuming from Topic
static java.lang.String KAFKA_ID
           
static int KAFKA_PARTITION_PER_HOST
           
static java.lang.String KAFKA_TOPIC
          Kafka Topic for current topology
static java.lang.String KAFKA_ZKROOT
          Don't know what it's used for..just ignore it
static java.lang.String KNOWLEDGE_PACKAGE_NAME
          The Knowledge package name in Guvnor Library This is used to get all the FactTypes from the package
static int MESSAGE_PER_SECOND
          For Test Case, the number of message per sec sent by RandomMessageSpout
static int MESSAGE_TOTAL
          For test case, Total message number for one test
static int MIN_FETCH_INTERVAL
          The minimum interval for dispatching the incoming messages to ProcessingBolt, measured by millisecond This should be defined with MIN_FETCH_SIZE together to fit the incoming messages
static int MIN_FETCH_SIZE
          The minimum list size for dispatching message to ProcessingBolt, if the number of incoming message per MESSAGE_PER_SECOND is higher than this size, it will be sent immediately
static int PROCESSING_BOLT_NUMBER
          ProcessingBolt number for DSP topology, based on the scale of input data It defines the parallel processing number
static int SPOUT_NUMBER
          Spout number for DSP topology, usually 1 Spout
static boolean STORM_DEBUG
          True if you want output all the message record
static int TEST_CASE
          Just for Test Case
static java.lang.String TOPOLOGY_NAME
           
static int WORKER_NUM
          Workers number for DSP topology Worker is kind of container, it contains several Bolt or Spout One supervisor is able to contain 4 Workers as default, set by storm.yaml

TOPOLOGY_NAME

public static java.lang.String TOPOLOGY_NAME

KNOWLEDGE_PACKAGE_NAME

public static java.lang.String KNOWLEDGE_PACKAGE_NAME
The Knowledge package name in Guvnor Library This is used to get all the FactTypes from the package

SPOUT_NUMBER

public static int SPOUT_NUMBER
Spout number for DSP topology, usually 1 Spout

DISPATCHER_BOLT_NUMBER

public static int DISPATCHER_BOLT_NUMBER
DispatcherBolt number for DSP topology, usually 1

PROCESSING_BOLT_NUMBER

public static int PROCESSING_BOLT_NUMBER
ProcessingBolt number for DSP topology, based on the scale of input data It defines the parallel processing number

ALARM_BOLT_NUMBER

public static int ALARM_BOLT_NUMBER
AlarmBolt number for DSP topology,basically 1

WORKER_NUM

public static int WORKER_NUM
Workers number for DSP topology Worker is kind of container, it contains several Bolt or Spout One supervisor is able to contain 4 Workers as default, set by storm.yaml

KAFKA_BROKER_URL

public static java.lang.String KAFKA_BROKER_URL
Kafka Server Address

KAFKA_PARTITION_PER_HOST

public static int KAFKA_PARTITION_PER_HOST

public static java.lang.String KAFKA_TOPIC
Kafka Topic for current topology

KAFKA_ZKROOT

public static java.lang.String KAFKA_ZKROOT
Don't know what it's used for..just ignore it

KAFKA_ID

public static java.lang.String KAFKA_ID

KAFKA_FORCE_START_OFFSET_TIME

public static int KAFKA_FORCE_START_OFFSET_TIME
It is a config of KafkaSpout, used to define where to start consuming from Topic

STORM_DEBUG

public static boolean STORM_DEBUG
True if you want output all the message record

TEST_CASE

public static int TEST_CASE
Just for Test Case

MESSAGE_PER_SECOND

public static int MESSAGE_PER_SECOND
For Test Case, the number of message per sec sent by RandomMessageSpout

MIN_FETCH_INTERVAL

public static int MIN_FETCH_INTERVAL
The minimum interval for dispatching the incoming messages to ProcessingBolt, measured by millisecond This should be defined with MIN_FETCH_SIZE together to fit the incoming messages

MIN_FETCH_SIZE

public static int MIN_FETCH_SIZE
The minimum list size for dispatching message to ProcessingBolt, if the number of incoming message per MESSAGE_PER_SECOND is higher than this size, it will be sent immediately

ALARM_TO_KAFKA

public static boolean ALARM_TO_KAFKA
If True, the alarm will sent to a Kafka Broker with topic "alarm"

MESSAGE_TOTAL

public static int MESSAGE_TOTAL
For test case, Total message number for one test

DELAY_COUNT_NUM

public static int DELAY_COUNT_NUM
For test case, It's used to set the count frequency
